title: How to rank up in the 2017 season

replies.body: I'm impressed that riot is actually taking action for the first time and listening to the members. I'm hyped for this new season and hope the rest of ya'll are too!{{item:3800}} {{item:3800}}
just a thought how come cass can't buy boots but nami can?
cass has inbuilt move speed higher then the others. which scales with mana i think. i'm pretty sure it's in her passive.
didnt get the **joke ** huh?
troll obvious troll?
idk what you're talking about {{champion:223}}
it scales with level , if it scaled with mana she would have more movespeed than a ghosting , e active hecarim

How to rank up in the 2017 season.

This article does not tell me anything about how to rank up in 2017.

Such lies.
Excuse me being dense, but I haven't got my ranked rewards, would I miss out if I dropped below gold playing flex queue right now?

No you wouldn't lose your ability to receive rewards if you were gold on November 8th at 12:00. They said the rewards would take about a week to start coming out. Playing in preseason will only minorly affect your ranking in 2017 season but wont change what rank you were for the 2016 season
Thank you ^^
Hey Riot Gehirn, I was just over on the NA comments section for this page, and I saw a massive amount of hate about the planned removal of Normal Draft. Any comment?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season Wow the comment section is in full butthurt mode. If they go ahead and actually remove it, I'm putting money down that Flex Q will become the new Practice Q. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/9YQiYOUk-how-to-rank-up-in-the-2017-season Also, not a single Red post. How just.

Just thinking "Gday ladies and gentlemen this is Gbay99, today will be taking Urgot to level 5 mastery. I don't comfortable playing him in SoloQ, and in blind pick I won't be guaranteed top or adc, so I'll be playing him in FlexQ they only way to get my role without ruining the one MMR I care about. Lets hope my teammates don't mind."

"Well I'm in a 4 man premade, and it seems they are boosting me... Not sure how to feel about this"
can we please get voice chat for at least flex queue
oh god please no.

its better to have the option built into game and mute toxics than not have the ability to communicate with your team, if you dont want voice chat in ranked queues luxaszner your saying pro's shouldn't have it either.  herogabe, or just put it in the game to get rid of having to use 3rd party programs, riot probably block it like they blocked curse client soon.

Does this mean we will get a twisted treeline ranked mode? That would be so awesome.
Riot i'm placed with platiniums on the other team and im silver only :((
Pretty sure they released a potential fix for it.
Will ladder calibration also apply to Solo/Duo Queue? Or just solely Flex Queue?
i was gold1 s6. and for the flex 5v5 i placed at P1, now im climbing to D5 . still very confused
Rip im bronze. #BronzeLife{{champion:17}}
Okay so what I dont get is Flex and Solo/Duo. Do you share your rank or are they both separate  mmr's. If they are seperate why can you solo flex. my brain hurts Rito
I'm so glad that Riot chose to make the 2017 start date 1 month early, I'm hyped for next season!
If I was bronze 4 last season and I win all my placements what rank will I be in?
It would be taken from your last ranked MMR. Placements have about a 50-50 weighting from your previous MMR and from your 10 provs games.
Are mastery tokens available to get in this queue? played a game as jinx yesterday at level 5 got an s and didn't get my second mastery token. Just me or anyone else?
Ok so i have done placments in the flex que. Will i have to do more placements when solo re-opens in oce?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
i have got the maokai skin reward and icon but why didnt i have the gold banner when log in the game?
question.. is there gonna be 3v3 flex rewards too? it doesnt say anything about 3v3 in here.. unless it just counts as flex
this new patch has ruined the game for me i don't know about anyone else but the buffed champions are 2 op and there isn't enough bans to counter it
Im so confused. If you get silver in preaseason, once the season starts, will you get reset or still silver?

you will have 10 games that INFLUENCE IN COMBINATION WITH LAST YEARS RANK WHERE YOU GET PLACED, preseason keeps last seasons rank and WILL EFFECT your rank placement matches outcome, but the main factor is 10 games you play when new season starts and unless you win 8 out of 10 you will be much lower than you ended preseason/last season.

I just wanted to clarify a few things about the flex placements happening in the preseason. Firstly how many placement games do we need to play before getting ranked. Secondly will season 6 dynamic q mmr come into play for flex q placements. I feel it would be unfair if bronze 5 players are versing challenger players due to soft reset.
A better Question is did riots OCE even adjust this post before reposting it, we may not even get whats written above.

"The 2017 ranked season officially kicks off on during Patch 6.24. Read below for details"

Still lookin below for the detals.

GG removing the better of the 2 normal queues modes bad move riot.

Give people extra incentive to play support and tank junglers (like a key frag every 5 games?)  and bring back team builder instead of both current normal queues.

excluding a role will get disabled immediately because not enough people will queue support / tank junglers without additional incentive.
{{champion:103}}
Thx for the updates and listening \^-^/
{{champion:134}} {{summoner:13}} {{item:3632}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Why can't challengers queue with eachother? Wasn't it clear on OCE release when everyone kept throwing games for raydere that people are gonna screw the system at high level play no matter what you do?

Ps, can you please do more updates to remove this brawl type of gameplay, it's boring and individual skill does not play such a big part as it once did. Yes there seems to be less toxic people than there once was but that is because nobody communicates anymore and most older players who helped this game become what it is today have quit due to poor champ design, lack of needed updates, Nerfing the AD carry role unless they have the kit to abuse masteries which are being used for unintended reasons.

But hey, what do I know? I'm only a silver player in brawl of legends 2k16

so im silver 2016 end season now that flex is out if i can manage to climb to gold in flex i can get the {{champion:57}} skin even tho the season is over and rewards are being processed for the end of season?
no
